data.why:
Contribution:

    Name DSLIP Description Info --------------- -----
    ------------------------------------- --------- Apache::
    ::JumpByReferer bdpfp Jump or block by Referer header field
    TANIGUCHI

    DESCRIPTION

    Apache::JumpByReferer is an access phase handler of Apache +
    mod_perl. You can block or let the user jump to another URL if the
    user was coming from your specified web site by passed Referer
    header field.

    similer to Apache::RefererBlock

    P.S. I made a mistake, because I didn't understand how to register
    me for CPAN. I had sent this mail to modules@cpan.org. Sorry ...
